snippet.title: HoverGrease 2  - Interview with the Mutants (Reveal Trailer)
snippet.description:
TOP-DOWN SHOOTER meets HERO SHOOTER in the electrifying fast-paced world of HoverGrease 2!

👉 WISHLIST NOW https://hovergrease.com/r/steam?s=ytat

Step into a dystopian bio-cyberpunk universe where chaos reigns supreme. Master unique mutants, unleash powerful abilities, and dominate in both the 14-chapter Singleplayer Story Mode and adrenaline-pumping 5v5 Multiplayer battles.

📌 ABOUT HOVERGREASE 2
HoverGrease 2 blends the thrill of twin-stick shooting with strategic team-based gameplay. Easy to pick up, but challenging to master, this hero-shooter offers:
• Unique mutants to match your playstyle
• Over 180 weapons and attacks
• No pay-to-win mechanics—everything unlocks from the start

LEARN MORE
https://hovergrease.com

Don’t miss out — hit the 🔔 and subscribe for updates!

#hovergrease #hovergrease2 #pcgames #officialtrailer #videogames
